channel.title: KMTT - The Torah Podcast
channel.description: KMTT - Ki Mitzion Teitze Torah - sends a 30-40 minute Torah shiur every day, from the teachers at Yeshivat Har Etzion and the VBM. For commuters, joggers, everyone!
